src_text: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
ref_text: Sɔ e wayi e gbadanu ɖo La Plata, toxo nɛ e ɖò aliga 50 (31 miles) dó Buenos Aires e ɔ, gǎn kplé gɔnu ɔ́ sín gǎn ɔ, nawe Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner tɔn éé nyí togan Argentine tɔn sín asi e ɖɔ̀ álɔ̀súsɔ́ tɔn ná dó ɖù togan.
hyp_text: Tɔn ɖo sɛnɛtɔr ɖo ɔ́, kɔnɔ Cristina Fɛrɔnɛndez dɛ Kɪrçhɛn yɛ ɔ́ mɔkpán ɖo ɔ́ tɔn ɖo ɔ́ yɔ̌yɔ̌ nu ɔ́ La Plata, tɔn ɖo ɔ́ 50 kilɔmɛtɛr (31 miles) tɔn ɔ́ ɔ́ Bɔnɛs Aɪɹɛs.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Fon]: {"translation": "Ayǐ ɖo hinhɔ̀n d'ayǐ ji wɛ ɔ́‚ mɛ̀ lɛ́ɛ nɔ́ ɖo síngbó lɛ́ɛ gbá wɛ káká yí ɖó hu ɔ́ tó."}

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Fon]: {"translation": "Miles 800 atɔ e nɔ dɔn ami gbɔn domɛ d’asá Alaska to ɔ́ tɔn é wɛ é sú, hwenu kalozíin bluju sín balíi afatɔ́ɔn donu mɔkpán kɔn nyì ayǐ do tofɔligbé Fairbanks toxo ɔ́ ɖo Alaska tó ɔ́ mɛ."}

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Fon]: {"translation": "Akpaxwè Beljik egbe tɔn lɛ wɛ nyi akpaxwè Luxembourg tɔn ɖayi amɔ̌ ye wa wùzù Beljik tɔn ɖó Gùfɔnfɔn Beljik tɔn ɖó xwè 1830 tɔn lɛ mɛ."}

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Fon]: {"translation": "Sín hwenu é jɔ e ɔ́, wěma “The Onion” wá húzú nǔ e nɔ ɖo jijɛ wɛ din lɛ́ɛ é sín wěgbó titeungbe ɖokpó, bɔ yě tlɛ ko zín akpáxwé tɔn ɖokpó, bó ɖó ɛntɛnɛti sín gɔnu ɖokpó, bɔ é dɔn gbɛtɔ́ 5,000,000 ɖo kɔ́nyásun ɔ́ mɛ. Bɔ yě yi kpɔ́n ajɔ́jlájlá mɛɖésúnɔ tɔn lɛ́ɛ, xó-xwlémɛ ganxixo 24 tɔn lɛ́ɛ, nǔsɔ́ dó ɛntɛnɛti jí lɛ́ɛ, kpódó gbɛ ɔ́ sín ɖiɖe dó atɛjí e é nyí kan ná yɔ̌yɔ̌ din, bɔ é nɔ nyí “Our Dumb World” ɔ́ kpó."}

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Fon]: {"translation": "Ayǐ ɖo hinhɔ̀n d'ayǐ ji wɛ ɔ́‚ mɛ̀ lɛ́ɛ nɔ́ ɖo síngbó lɛ́ɛ gbá wɛ káká yí ɖó hu ɔ́ tó."}

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Fon]: {"translation": "Miles 800 atɔ e nɔ dɔn ami gbɔn domɛ d’asá Alaska to ɔ́ tɔn é wɛ é sú, hwenu kalozíin bluju sín balíi afatɔ́ɔn donu mɔkpán kɔn nyì ayǐ do tofɔligbé Fairbanks toxo ɔ́ ɖo Alaska tó ɔ́ mɛ."}

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Fon]: {"translation": "Akpaxwè Beljik egbe tɔn lɛ wɛ nyi akpaxwè Luxembourg tɔn ɖayi amɔ̌ ye wa wùzù Beljik tɔn ɖó Gùfɔnfɔn Beljik tɔn ɖó xwè 1830 tɔn lɛ mɛ."}

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Fon]: {"translation": "Sín hwenu é jɔ e ɔ́, wěma “The Onion” wá húzú nǔ e nɔ ɖo jijɛ wɛ din lɛ́ɛ é sín wěgbó titeungbe ɖokpó, bɔ yě tlɛ ko zín akpáxwé tɔn ɖokpó, bó ɖó ɛntɛnɛti sín gɔnu ɖokpó, bɔ é dɔn gbɛtɔ́ 5,000,000 ɖo kɔ́nyásun ɔ́ mɛ. Bɔ yě yi kpɔ́n ajɔ́jlájlá mɛɖésúnɔ tɔn lɛ́ɛ, xó-xwlémɛ ganxixo 24 tɔn lɛ́ɛ, nǔsɔ́ dó ɛntɛnɛti jí lɛ́ɛ, kpódó gbɛ ɔ́ sín ɖiɖe dó atɛjí e é nyí kan ná yɔ̌yɔ̌ din, bɔ é nɔ nyí “Our Dumb World” ɔ́ kpó."}
